TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SystemParameter extends System.Enum

remarks.format:
## Remarks The SystemParameter enumeration is primarily used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent%2A> method. <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent%2A> retrieves whether a SystemParameter is supported on the current version of the operating system.
For more information about system-wide parameters, see "SystemParametersInfo" in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter CaretWidthMetric = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Identifies the caret width, in pixels, for edit controls. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.CaretWidth?qualifyHint=True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter DropShadow = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Identifies the drop shadow effect. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsDropShadowEnabled?qualifyHint=True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter FlatMenu = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Identifies the flat menu appearance feature. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsFlatMenuEnabled?qualifyHint=True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter FontSmoothingContrastMetric = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Identifies the contrast value used in ClearType font smoothing. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FontSmoothingContrast?qualifyHint=True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter FontSmoothingTypeMetric = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Identifies the type of font smoothing. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FontSmoothingType?qualifyHint=True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter HorizontalFocusThicknessMetric = int32(10)

Docs.summary: Identifies the thickness of the left and right edges of the system focus rectangle. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.HorizontalFocusThickness?qualifyHint=True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter MenuFadeEnabled = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Identifies the menu fade animation feature. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuFadeEnabled?qualifyHint=True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter SelectionFade = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Identifies the selection fade effect. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsSelectionFadeEnabled?qualifyHint=True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter ToolTipAnimationMetric = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Identifies the ToolTip animation feature. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsToolTipAnimationEnabled?qualifyHint=True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter UIEffects = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Identifies the user interface (UI) effects feature. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.UIEffectsEnabled?qualifyHint=True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter VerticalFocusThicknessMetric = int32(9)

Docs.summary: Identifies the thickness of the top and bottom edges of the system focus rectangle. Use the P:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalFocusThickness?qualifyHint=True
